body_html: Yeah, we suggest that you implement it on top of the C API because we'll have versioning stability there after the 1.0 release. It's also what the other language bindings will be using, including Java, which won't be built using javacpp.
body_text: Yeah, we suggest that you implement it on top of the C API because we'll have versioning stability there after the 1.0 release. It's also what the other language bindings will be using, including Java, which won't be built using javacpp.
body: Yeah, we suggest that you implement it on top of the C API because we'll have versioning stability there after the 1.0 release. It's also what the other language bindings will be using, including Java, which won't be built using javacpp.
